select m.NICKNAME, m.member_no, NVL(s.STARRATING,0) as StarRating, r.reply_no, r.reg_date, r.contents, NVL(l.LikeCount,0) as LikeCount, NVL(c.commentCount,0) as commentCount from reply r
LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON m.member_no = r.member_no
LEFT OUTER JOIN star s ON ( r.MEMBER_NO = s.MEMBER_NO and r.board_no= s.ebook_no)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select reply_no, count(*) as LikeCount from like_it GROUP BY reply_no ) l ON l.REPLY_NO = r.REPLY_NO
